title: Does Gravel Belong at the Tour de France? Favorites Fear Disaster in the Dirt
content:
'It's the day when you can lose the Tour': Is race organizer's hope for 'chaos' on the 2024 Tour's gravel stage a risk too far?

Read the full article at Does Gravel Belong at the Tour de France? Favorites Fear Disaster in the Dirt on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
